statements: SELECT * FROM student_interaction_data;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id FROM student_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'quiz';
SELECT MAX(interaction_timestamp) FROM student_interaction_data;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM student_interaction_data ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_interaction_data WHERE lesson_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM student_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'quiz' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interaction_data GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT lesson_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interaction_data GROUP BY lesson_id ORDER BY lesson_id ASC;
SELECT interaction_type, DATE(interaction_timestamp) AS date, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interaction_data GROUP BY interaction_type, date ORDER BY date DESC, interaction_count DESC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(interaction_timestamp, '2022-01-01')) AS avg_days_since_start FROM student_interaction_data;
SELECT * FROM student_interaction_data WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_id, interaction_type FROM student_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT lesson_id FROM student_interaction_data WHERE student_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM student_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type IN ('click', 'view') AND lesson_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS average_engagement FROM engagement_analysis GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(engagement_score) > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_interaction_data WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, interaction_type FROM student_interaction_data WHERE lesson_id = 456 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_interaction_data WHERE student_id = 789 AND interaction_type = 'quiz' AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lesson_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_analysis WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY lesson_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(lesson_id) AS total_lessons FROM student_interaction_data GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_lessons >= 5;
SELECT * FROM student_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, interaction_type FROM student_data WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, count(*) AS total_interactions FROM student_data GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_date, lesson_duration FROM lesson_data WHERE lesson_date >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY lesson_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_data WHERE engagement_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_data WHERE student_id = 123 AND lesson_id = 456 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, lesson_name, lesson_date FROM lesson_data WHERE lesson_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY lesson_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT student_id, lesson_name, engagement_score FROM student_data JOIN engagement_data ON student_data.student_id = engagement_data.student_id AND student_data.lesson_id = engagement_data.lesson_id WHERE engagement_score > 0.8 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT lesson_id, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM student_data GROUP BY lesson_id HAVING student_count > 5 ORDER BY student_count DESC;
SELECT lesson_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM engagement_data GROUP BY lesson_id HAVING avg_score < 0.7 ORDER BY avg_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students;
SELECT lesson_name, teacher_id FROM lessons WHERE lesson_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, lesson_name FROM students JOIN lessons ON students.student_id = lessons.teacher_id;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_time FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students;
SELECT * FROM lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, lesson_name, interaction_type FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id WHERE interaction_type = 'attendance';
SELECT student_name, engagement_level FROM students JOIN engagement_levels ON students.student_id = engagement_levels.student_id WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY engagement_date;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT lesson_name, subject FROM Lessons WHERE lesson_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lesson_date;
SELECT student_name, grade_value FROM Students s JOIN Grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(quiz_id) AS quiz_count FROM Students s JOIN Quizzes q ON s.student_id = q.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING quiz_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, grade FROM Students WHERE age > 20 AND grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, subject, lesson_date FROM Students JOIN Lessons ON Students.student_id = Lessons.lesson_id WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, lesson_name, quiz_score FROM Students JOIN Quizzes ON Students.student_id = Quizzes.student_id ORDER BY quiz_score DESC;
SELECT lesson_name, grade_value, grade_date FROM Lessons JOIN Grades ON Lessons.lesson_id = Grades.lesson_id WHERE grade_value = 'A' AND grade_date > '2022-01-01';
